description: This file defines a Java class SetDeviceAddressesRequest, which extends a base class Request. It appears to be part of a mocking framework for Zigbee core requests, specifically handling a request to set device addresses and generating a corresponding response.
external_methods: new Response(int requestId, int code, String message).send()

classes.name: SetDeviceAddressesRequest
classes.description: A request class for setting device addresses in the mock Zigbee core, extending the base Request class, and responsible for sending a response upon execution.

methods.name: SetDeviceAddressesRequest
methods.description: Constructor that initializes the request with a given request ID.

methods.name: execute
methods.description: Overrides the execute method to send a 'setDeviceAddressesResponse' with a success code.
